description:
The frogs are being sneaky lately, so Fuyuki decides to find out what they`re up to.  Turns out they have a new secret base... and some pretty scary security measures guarding it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shinryaku Sakusen Zekkou Chou! de Arimasu / Keroro Machigai Darake no Kichi Tsukuri de Arimasu
Retour aux choses sérieuses / Danger pour la base
ケロロ侵略作戦絶好調! であります / ケロロ間違いだらけの基地作り であります
